title: WE GOT A WEBSITE!!!!
content:
(my first time wrting a blog post sorry if it sucks) Hi guys! this is the first official blog post on the new animation vs fnf website! its pretty awesome

 

this website was coded by white ninja its actually awesome be sure to check out everything on this website (maybe theress even secrets ?) dont worry well still be posting teasers on twitter but still be sure to check out this website from time to time

 

we made a website because uhhh we wanted to yay and also because its easy to navigate too i guess idk I HATE TWITETWEER

 

the purpose of these blog posts is for us to talk about the mod and hows its going think of it as like a mini devlog

title: My Hit AvFNF Blog Post
content:
Hey everyone! It‚Äôs JaceLOL, one of the musicians for the mod! It‚Äôs been a hot minute since I was hired and BOYYYY did we get some juicy stuff done, such as this website made by White Ninja (the goat). In this post, I just wanted to answer some questions you guys may have and talk about some of the things that are to be expected with this update, so without further ado, let‚Äôs get into it:

 

 

Q: What will be in AvFNF Episode 2?

 

A: Due to ‚Äúlegal‚Äù obligations by the directors I can‚Äôt reveal TOO much, however, it has been confirmed that the entire main week is getting remastered and there will be a week dedicated to episodes 25-30 of AVM Season 3 (which is where most of the songs I made will be :3). Other than that, you‚Äôll just have to wait and see :)

 

 

Q: When do you think the mod is releasing?

 

A: I don‚Äôt know we ain‚Äôt there yet lmao

 

 

Q: What is your favorite song currently?

 

A: Definitely Chosen V2. The people who remade it did a good job replicating the original, as well as making it sound better than before!

 

 

Q: What is your favorite part about development?

 

A: Definitely studying and learning from other musicians. There are a lot of people who specialize in different genres and it‚Äôs fun to study their music!

 

 

Q: Will there be anything related to AVA 6?

 

A: Sadly not, since all of the songs in the mod are connected in some way. Adding the lore of AVA 6 would not work out with the story, so other than Victim‚Äôs songs, there won‚Äôt be any mentions of AVA 6 in the mod (sorry!)

 

 

Q: will hood irony be in the mod

 

A: yeah man

 

 

That‚Äôs all from me for now. I‚Äôll post something else later on down the line, but until then, always pray to god and see you guys soon!

title: But I‚Äôm TCO week 1
content:
hey guys. im noogai9876, a director of avf, and i do art and a LOT of animation. i‚Äôve been here since before v1 (you might‚Äôve already known this if you looked at credits lol) and it‚Äôs been a fun experience watching the mod grow little by little. my junior high years were basically spent in avf, so i hope you guys enjoy what we‚Äôve cooked up for you :333

 

 

im just gonna copy jacelol‚Äôs questions tehe

 

Q: What will be in AvFNF Episode 2?

 

A: LORE, a whole album of new songs and LOTS of remasters. main week will be fully remastered (except for alan‚Äôs iconic desktop), and chosen, vengeance and fallen will be merged into one week (with two new songs; cant wait to see your reactions), as well as the long-anticipated king orange week etc.

 

 

Q: When do you think the mod is releasing?

 

A: NEVER /j

 

 

Q: What is your favorite song currently?

 

A: dreaducation without a doubt (sorry chosen v2)

 

 

Q: What is your favorite part about development?

 

A: animating

 

 

Q: Will there be anything related to AVA 6?

 

A: TCO WEEK 2?!? /j NEVER

 

 

Q: will there be hood irony in the mod

 

A: dud

 

as well as some of my own

 

Q: Who‚Äôs your favorite AvA character?

 

A: TCO week 1

 

 

Q: Who‚Äôs your favorite AvFNF developer?

 

A: swoleboi bc peak musician

 

 

Q: are you gay

 

A: no

 

ok byee
